locations: New York City, New York, USA::(location)
imdb.plot outline: In this highly stylistic series "Silent Strings" introduces aspects of time and longing. Surrealist imagery, sound, perception, and artifice in opposition to the all-encompassing dominance of the technological gaze as the creator of "meaning." While biographical in origin, "Silent Strings" import is universal and manifests a probing vision that is both personal and social.
imdb.title: Silent Strings
plot: In this highly stylistic series "_Silent Strings_ (qv)" introduces aspects of time and longing. Surrealist imagery, sound, perception, and artifice in opposition to the all-encompassing dominance of the technological gaze as the creator of "meaning." While biographical in origin, "_Silent Strings_ (qv)" import is universal and manifests a probing vision that is both personal and social.::Quinn Ford
